name: Combat Crustaceans
description:
Combat Crustaceans is a party style local multiplayer game for 2-4 players. Do battle against you friends avoiding their attacks and power-ups all while preserving your precious charge! Players can recharge by connecting to one of the multiple charge towers spread over the map or by stealing it from other players. Being a Local multiplayer game  allows for players to connect with friends and family (maybe once lock down is lifted) all while having a great time!

Please note one Gamepad is required per person to play with a minimum of 2 players. We have included a controller diagram below with the controls layout.
